oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Imperfect copies: several pages torn, worm-eaten or fragile and some missing.
Bound as one volume; binding by Kāgadī Kādarbhāî Āzambhāî, Bookbinder, Kharadar, Karachi.

Contains: 100 ginānjī:ćopaḍi:bhāg:pahelo / Pīr Imām Shāh (Bombay, 1903) ; 100 ginānjī:ćopaḍi..bhāg:bījo / Pīr Imām Shāh (Bombay, 1903) ; 100 ginānjī:ćopaḍi..bhāg:trījo / Pīr Imām Shāh (Bombay, 1903) ; 102 ginānjī:ćopaḍi...bhāg:ćotho / Pīr Imām Shāh (Bombay, 1903).
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
